name: pkg-config

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: sysstat
dependent_to.description:
The sysstat package contains various utilities, common to many
commercial Unixes, to monitor system performance and usage activity
Sysstat also contains tools you can schedule via cron or systemd to
collect and historize performance and activity data.

dependent_to.name: netpbm
dependent_to.description:
Netpbm - graphics tools and converters. A whole bunch of utilities for
primitive manipulation of graphic images. Wide array of converters from
one graphics format to another. E.g. from g3 fax format to jpeg. Many
basic graphics editing tools such as magnifying and cropping.

dependent_to.name: orbit2
dependent_to.description: ORBit is a fast and lightweight CORBA server.

dependent_to.name: perl-alien-libxml2
dependent_to.description: This module provides libxml2 for other modules to use.

dependent_to.name: py-scipy
dependent_to.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependent_to.name: appres
dependent_to.description:
The appres program prints the resources seen by an application (or
subhierarchy of an application) with the specified class and instance
names. It can be used to determine which resources a particular program
will load.

dependent_to.name: flux-security
dependent_to.description: Independent project for Flux security code and APIs.

dependent_to.name: xdpyinfo
dependent_to.description:
xdpyinfo is a utility for displaying information about an X server. It
is used to examine the capabilities of a server, the predefined values
for various parameters used in communicating between clients and the
server, and the different types of screens, visuals, and X11 protocol
extensions that are available.

dependent_to.name: libxext
dependent_to.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependent_to.name: sshfs
dependent_to.description: SSHFS allows you to mount a remote filesystem using SFTP.

dependent_to.name: freetype
dependent_to.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependent_to.name: hpx5
dependent_to.description:
The HPX-5 Runtime System. HPX-5 (High Performance ParalleX) is an open
source, portable, performance-oriented runtime developed at CREST
(Indiana University). HPX-5 provides a distributed programming model
allowing programs to run unmodified on systems from a single SMP to
large clusters and supercomputers with thousands of nodes. HPX-5
supports a wide variety of Intel and ARM platforms. It is being used by
a broad range of scientific applications enabling scientists to write
code that performs and scales better than contemporary runtimes.

dependent_to.name: libapplewm
dependent_to.description:
AppleWM is a simple library designed to interface with the Apple-WM
extension. This extension allows X window managers to better interact
with the Mac OS X Aqua user interface when running X11 in a rootless
mode.

dependent_to.name: librsvg
dependent_to.description: Library to render SVG files using Cairo

dependent_to.name: xset
dependent_to.description: User preference utility for X.

dependent_to.name: apptainer
dependent_to.description:
Apptainer is an open source container platform designed to be simple,
fast, and secure. Many container platforms are available, but Apptainer
is designed for ease-of-use on shared systems and in high performance
computing (HPC) environments. Needs post-install chmod/chown steps to
enable full functionality. See package definition or `spack-build-
out.txt` build log for details, e.g.: tail -15 $(spack location -i
apptainer)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependent_to.name: py-sentencepiece
dependent_to.description:
Unsupervised text tokenizer for Neural Network-based text generation.
These are the Python bindings.

dependent_to.name: ftgl
dependent_to.description: Library to use arbitrary fonts in OpenGL applications.

dependent_to.name: openbabel
dependent_to.description:
Open Babel is a chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of
chemical data. It's an open, collaborative project allowing anyone to
search, convert, analyze, or store data from molecular modeling,
chemistry, solid-state materials, biochemistry, or related areas.

dependent_to.name: pango
dependent_to.description:
Pango is a library for laying out and rendering of text, with an
emphasis on internationalization. It can be used anywhere that text
layout is needed, though most of the work on Pango so far has been done
in the context of the GTK+ widget toolkit.

dependent_to.name: libxfixes
dependent_to.description:
This package contains header files and documentation for the XFIXES
extension. Library and server implementations are separate.

dependent_to.name: vala
dependent_to.description:
Vala is a programming language that aims to bring modern programming
language features to GNOME developers without imposing any additional
runtime requirements and without using a different ABI compared to
applications and libraries written in C.

dependent_to.name: procps
dependent_to.description:
Command line and full screen utilities for browsing procfs, a "pseudo"
file system dynamically generated by the kernel to provide information
about the status of entries in its process table.

dependent_to.name: libfs
dependent_to.description:
libFS - X Font Service client library. This library is used by clients
of X Font Servers (xfs), such as xfsinfo, fslsfonts, and the X servers
themselves.

dependent_to.name: crosstool-ng
dependent_to.description:
Crosstool-NG is a versatile (cross) toolchain generator. It supports
many architectures and components and has a simple yet powerful
menuconfig-style interface.

dependent_to.name: mesa18
dependent_to.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependent_to.name: hoomd-blue
dependent_to.description:
HOOMD-blue is a general-purpose particle simulation toolkit. It scales
from a single CPU core to thousands of GPUs. You define particle initial
conditions and interactions in a high-level python script. Then tell
HOOMD-blue how you want to execute the job and it takes care of the
rest. Python job scripts give you unlimited flexibility to create custom
initialization routines, control simulation parameters, and perform in
situ analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.

dependent_to.name: cairo
dependent_to.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependent_to.name: libpciaccess
dependent_to.description: Generic PCI access library.

dependent_to.name: libwmf
dependent_to.description:
libwmf is a library for reading vector images in Microsft's native
Windows Metafile Format (WMF)

dependent_to.name: cairomm
dependent_to.description: Cairomm is a C++ wrapper for the cairo graphics library.

dependent_to.name: flux-pmix
dependent_to.description: A flux shell plugin to bootstrap openmpi v5+

dependent_to.name: gtkmm
dependent_to.description: Gtkmm is the official C++ interface for the popular GUI library GTK+.

dependent_to.name: libpeas
dependent_to.description:
libpeas is a gobject-based plugins engine, and is targeted at giving
every application the chance to assume its own extensibility.

dependent_to.name: gexiv2
dependent_to.description:
gexiv2 is a GObject wrapper around the Exiv2 photo metadata library. It
allows for GNOME applications to easily inspect and update EXIF, IPTC,
and XMP metadata in photo and video files of various formats.

dependent_to.name: xkeyboard-config
dependent_to.description:
This project provides a consistent, well-structured, frequently
released, open source database of keyboard configuration data. The
project is targeted to XKB-based systems.

dependent_to.name: steps
dependent_to.description: STochastic Engine for Pathway Simulation

dependent_to.name: resourceproto
dependent_to.description:
X Resource Extension. This extension defines a protocol that allows a
client to query the X server about its usage of various resources.

dependent_to.name: qt-quicktimeline
dependent_to.description: Module for keyframe-based timeline construction.

dependent_to.name: jose
dependent_to.description: This package contains a C library for performing JOSE operations.

dependent_to.name: prrte
dependent_to.description:
PRRTE is the Reference RunTime Environment implementation for PMIx. It
is capable of operating within a host SMS. The reference RTE therefore
provides an easy way of exploring PMIx capabilities and testing PMIx-
based applications outside of a PMIx-enabled environment.

dependent_to.name: qucs
dependent_to.description:
QUCS - Quite Universal Circuit Simulator Qucs is an integrated circuit
simulator which means you are able to setup a circuit with a graphical
user interface (GUI) and simulate the large-signal, small-signal and
noise behaviour of the circuit. After that simulation has finished you
can view the simulation results on a presentation page or window.

dependent_to.name: libjwt
dependent_to.description: libjwt JSON Web Token C Library

dependent_to.name: kicad
dependent_to.description:
KiCad is an open source software suite for Electronic Design Automation
(EDA). The programs handle Schematic Capture, and PCB Layout with Gerber
output.

dependent_to.name: autogen
dependent_to.description:
AutoGen is a tool designed to simplify the creation and maintenance of
programs that contain large amounts of repetitious text. It is
especially valuable in programs that have several blocks of text that
must be kept synchronized.

dependent_to.name: xeyes
dependent_to.description: xeyes - a follow the mouse X demo, using the X SHAPE extension

dependent_to.name: glfw
dependent_to.description:
GLFW is an Open Source, multi-platform library for OpenGL, OpenGL ES and
Vulkan development on the desktop. It provides a simple API for creating
windows, contexts and surfaces, receiving input and events.

dependent_to.name: py-pycairo
dependent_to.description: Pycairo is a set of Python bindings for the cairo graphics library.

dependent_to.name: libplist
dependent_to.description: Library for Apple Binary- and XML-Property Lists.

dependent_to.name: octave
dependent_to.description:
GNU Octave is a high-level language, primarily intended for numerical
computations. It provides a convenient command line interface for
solving linear and nonlinear problems numerically, and for performing
other numerical experiments using a language that is mostly compatible
with Matlab. It may also be used as a batch-oriented language.

dependent_to.name: libxfontcache
dependent_to.description: Xfontcache - X-TrueType font cache extension client library.

dependent_to.name: warpx
dependent_to.description:
WarpX is an advanced electromagnetic Particle-In-Cell code. It supports
many features including Perfectly-Matched Layers (PML) and mesh
refinement. In addition, WarpX is a highly-parallel and highly-optimized
code and features hybrid OpenMP/MPI parallelization, advanced
vectorization techniques and load balancing capabilities. For WarpX'
Python bindings and PICMI input support, see the 'py-warpx' package.

dependent_to.name: xrandr
dependent_to.description:
xrandr - primitive command line interface to X11 Resize, Rotate, and
Reflect (RandR) extension.

dependent_to.name: libgd
dependent_to.description:
GD is an open source code library for the dynamic creation of images by
programmers. GD is written in C, and "wrappers" are available for Perl,
PHP and other languages. GD creates PNG, JPEG, GIF, WebP, XPM, BMP
images, among other formats. GD is commonly used to generate charts,
graphics, thumbnails, and most anything else, on the fly. While not
restricted to use on the web, the most common applications of GD involve
website development.

dependent_to.name: dia
dependent_to.description: Dia is a program for drawing structured diagrams.

dependent_to.name: poppler
dependent_to.description: Poppler is a PDF rendering library based on the xpdf-3.0 code base.

dependent_to.name: xcb-util-renderutil
dependent_to.description:
The XCB util modules provides a number of libraries which sit on top of
libxcb, the core X protocol library, and some of the extension
libraries. These experimental libraries provide convenience functions
and interfaces which make the raw X protocol more usable. Some of the
libraries also provide client-side code which is not strictly part of
the X protocol but which have traditionally been provided by Xlib.

dependent_to.name: tmux
dependent_to.description:
Tmux is a terminal multiplexer. What is a terminal multiplexer? It lets
you switch easily between several programs in one terminal, detach them
(they keep running in the background) and reattach them to a different
terminal. And do a lot more.

dependent_to.name: damask-grid
dependent_to.description: Grid solver for DAMASK

dependent_to.name: dtc
dependent_to.description:
Device Tree Compiler (dtc) toolchain for working with device tree source
and binary files and also libfdt, a utility library for reading and
manipulating the binary format.

dependent_to.name: xrx
dependent_to.description:
The remote execution (RX) service specifies a MIME format for invoking
applications remotely, for example via a World Wide Web browser. This RX
format specifies a syntax for listing network services required by the
application, for example an X display server. The requesting Web browser
must identify specific instances of the services in the request to
invoke the application.

dependent_to.name: libxpresent
dependent_to.description:
This package contains header files and documentation for the Present
extension. Library and server implementations are separate.

dependent_to.name: gobject-introspection
dependent_to.description:
The GObject Introspection is used to describe the program APIs and
collect them in a uniform, machine readable format.Cairo is a 2D
graphics library with support for multiple output

dependent_to.name: assimp
dependent_to.description:
Open Asset Import Library (Assimp) is a portable Open Source library to
import various well-known 3D model formats in a uniform manner.

dependent_to.name: rr
dependent_to.description: Application execution recorder, player and debugger

dependent_to.name: libxfont
dependent_to.description:
libXfont provides the core of the legacy X11 font system, handling the
index files (fonts.dir, fonts.alias, fonts.scale), the various font file
formats, and rasterizing them. It is used by the X servers, the X Font
Server (xfs), and some font utilities (bdftopcf for instance), but
should not be used by normal X11 clients. X11 clients access fonts via
either the new API's in libXft, or the legacy API's in libX11.

dependent_to.name: liboldx
dependent_to.description: X version 10 backwards compatibility.

dependent_to.name: xrdb
dependent_to.description: xrdb - X server resource database utility.

dependent_to.name: glib
dependent_to.description:
GLib provides the core application building blocks for libraries and
applications written in C. The GLib package contains a low-level
libraries useful for providing data structure handling for C,
portability wrappers and interfaces for such runtime functionality as an
event loop, threads, dynamic loading and an object system.

dependent_to.name: uftrace
dependent_to.description:
Dynamic function graph tracer for Linux which demangles C, C++ and Rust
calls

dependent_to.name: rocmlir
dependent_to.description:
This is the repository for a MLIR-based convolution and GEMM kernel
generator targetting AMD hardware. This generator is mainly used from
MIOpen and MIGraphX, but it can be used on a standalone basis.

dependent_to.name: constype
dependent_to.description:
constype prints on the standard output the Sun code for the type of
display that the specified device is. It was originally written for
SunOS, but has been ported to other SPARC OS'es and to Solaris on both
SPARC & x86.

dependent_to.name: mgardx
dependent_to.description:
MGARD implementation for research purposes forked from:
https://github.com/lxAltria/MGARDx

dependent_to.name: cscope
dependent_to.description: Cscope is a developer's tool for browsing source code.

dependent_to.name: neovim
dependent_to.description: Neovim: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

dependent_to.name: libbeagle
dependent_to.description:
Beagle performs genotype calling, genotype phasing, imputation of
ungenotyped markers, and identity-by-descent segment detection.

dependent_to.name: py-cryptography
dependent_to.description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers

dependent_to.name: at-spi2-core
dependent_to.description:
The At-Spi2 Core package provides a Service Provider Interface for the
Assistive Technologies available on the GNOME platform and a library

dependent_to.name: fenics-dolfinx
dependent_to.description: Next generation FEniCS problem solving environment

dependent_to.description: xinput is a utility to configure and test XInput devices.

dependent_to.name: xditview
dependent_to.description: xditview displays ditroff output on an X display.

dependent_to.name: libxevie
dependent_to.description: Xevie - X Event Interception Extension (XEvIE).

dependent_to.name: util-linux-uuid
dependent_to.description: Util-linux is a suite of essential utilities for any Linux system.

dependent_to.name: arpack-ng
dependent_to.description:
ARPACK-NG is a collection of Fortran77 subroutines designed to solve
large scale eigenvalue problems. Important Features: * Reverse
Communication Interface. * Single and Double Precision Real Arithmetic
Versions for Symmetric, Non-symmetric, Standard or Generalized Problems.
* Single and Double Precision Complex Arithmetic Versions for Standard
or Generalized Problems. * Routines for Banded Matrices - Standard or
Generalized Problems. * Routines for The Singular Value Decomposition. *
Example driver routines that may be used as templates to implement
numerous Shift-Invert strategies for all problem types, data types and
precision. This project is a joint project between Debian, Octave and
Scilab in order to provide a common and maintained version of arpack.
Indeed, no single release has been published by Rice university for the
last few years and since many software (Octave, Scilab, R, Matlab...)
forked it and implemented their own modifications, arpack-ng aims to
tackle this by providing a common repository and maintained versions.
arpack-ng is replacing arpack almost everywhere.

dependent_to.name: xtb
dependent_to.description: Semiempirical extended tight binding program package

dependent_to.name: xcb-util-errors
dependent_to.description:
The XCB util modules provides a number of libraries which sit on top of

libraries. These experimental libraries provide convenience functions
and interfaces which make the raw X protocol more usable. Some of the
libraries also provide client-side code which is not strictly part of

dependent_to.name: ico
dependent_to.description:
ico is a simple animation program that may be used for testing various

polyhedron, with hidden lines removed, or a solid-fill polyhedron with
hidden faces removed.

dependent_to.name: xmore

X Input Extension. This extension defines a protocol to provide

dependent_to.name: mscgen
dependent_to.description:
Mscgen is a small program that parses Message Sequence Chart

dependent_to.name: libxrandr
dependent_to.description: libXrandr - X Resize, Rotate and Reflection extension library.

dependent_to.name: ncurses

The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses
in System V Release 4.0, and more. It uses terminfo format, supports

xvinfo prints out the capabilities of any video adaptors associated with

dependent_to.name: openscenegraph
dependent_to.description:
OpenSceneGraph is an open source, high performance 3D graphics toolkit

dependent_to.name: pandaseq

PANDASEQ is a program to align Illumina reads, optionally with PCR

sequence.

dependent_to.name: davix
dependent_to.description: High-performance file management over WebDAV/HTTP.

dependent_to.name: xmessage

xmessage displays a message or query in a window. The user can click on
an "okay" button to dismiss it or can select one of several buttons to
answer a question. xmessage can also exit after a specified time.

dependent_to.name: presentproto

dependent_to.name: dri2proto

Direct Rendering Infrastructure 2 Extension. This extension defines a
protocol to securely allow user applications to access the video
hardware without requiring data to be passed through the X server.

dependent_to.name: xsetpointer
dependent_to.description: Set an X Input device as the main pointer.

dependent_to.name: gqrx
dependent_to.description:
Gqrx is an open source software defined radio (SDR) receiver implemented
using GNU Radio and the Qt GUI toolkit. Currently it works on Linux and
Mac with hardware supported by gr-osmosdr, including Funcube Dongle,
RTL-SDR, Airspy, HackRF, BladeRF, RFSpace, USRP and SoapySDR. Gqrx can
operate as an AM/FM/SSB receiver with audio output or as an FFT-only
instrument. There are also various hooks for interacting with external
application using nertwork sockets.

dependent_to.name: i3

i3, improved tiling wm. i3 is a tiling window manager, completely
written from scratch. The target platforms are GNU/Linux and BSD
operating systems, our code is Free and Open Source Software (FOSS)
under the BSD license. i3 is primarily targeted at advanced users and

cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring

dependent_to.description: This package contains the library for the X Damage extension.

implementations are separate.

dependent_to.name: viewres

dependent_to.name: libsecret

libsecret is a library for storing and retrieving passwords and other
secrets. It communicates with the "Secret Service" using D-Bus. gnome-
keyring and ksecretservice are both implementations of a Secret Service.
libsecret replaces libgnome-keyring

dependent_to.name: slirp4netns
dependent_to.description: User-mode networking for unprivileged network namespaces

dependent_to.name: twm

twm is a window manager for the X Window System. It provides titlebars,
shaped windows, several forms of icon management, user-defined macro

specified key and pointer button bindings.

dependent_to.name: r-hdf5r
dependent_to.description:
Interface to the 'HDF5' Binary Data Format. 'HDF5' is a data model,
library and file format for storing and managing large amounts of data.
This package provides a nearly feature complete, object oriented wrapper
for the 'HDF5' API
<https://support.hdfgroup.org/HDF5/doc/RM/RM_H5Front.html> using R6
classes. Additionally, functionality is added so that 'HDF5' objects
behave very similar to their corresponding R counterparts.

dependent_to.name: riscv-gnu-toolchain

dependent_to.name: freesasa
dependent_to.description: C-library for calculating Solvent Accessible Surface Areas

dependent_to.name: gts
dependent_to.description:
GTS stands for the GNU Triangulated Surface Library. It is an Open
Source Free Software Library intended to provide a set of useful
functions to deal with 3D surfaces meshed with interconnected triangles.
The source code is available free of charge under the Free Software LGPL
license. The code is written entirely in C with an object-oriented
approach based mostly on the design of GTK+. Careful attention is paid
to performance related issues as the initial goal of GTS is to provide a
simple and efficient library to scientists dealing with 3D computational
surface meshes.

dependent_to.name: dmxproto

Distributed Multihead X (DMX) Extension. This extension defines a

multiple back-end X servers making up a large display.

dependent_to.name: libxau
dependent_to.description:

dependent_to.name: libxrender

dependent_to.name: ecflow

ecFlow is a work flow package that enables users to run a large number
of programs (with dependencies on each other and on time) in a

failures, combined with good restart capabilities.

dependent_to.name: xhost

dependent_to.name: xmag

elfutils is a collection of various binary tools such as eu-objdump, eu-

dependent_to.name: serenity

high-level data management library which enforces memory coherency over

dependent_to.name: pmix
dependent_to.description:
The Process Management Interface (PMI) has been used for quite some time
as a means of exchanging wireup information needed for interprocess
communication. However, meeting the significant orchestration challenges
presented by exascale systems requires that the process-to-system
interface evolve to permit a tighter integration between the different
components of the parallel application and existing and future SMS
solutions. PMI Exascale (PMIx) addresses these needs by providing an
extended version of the PMI definitions specifically designed to support
exascale and beyond environments by: (a) adding flexibility to the
functionality expressed in the existing APIs, (b) augmenting the
interfaces with new APIs that provide extended capabilities, (c) forging
a collaboration between subsystem providers including resource manager,
fabric, file system, and programming library developers, (d)
establishing a standards-like body for maintaining the definitions, and
(e) providing a reference implementation of the PMIx standard that
demonstrates the desired level of scalability while maintaining strict
separation between it and the standard itself.

dependent_to.name: singularity

Singularity is a container technology focused on building portable
encapsulated environments to support "Mobility of Compute" For older
versions of Singularity (pre 3.0) you should use singularity-legacy,
which has a different install base (Autotools). Needs post-install
chmod/chown steps to enable full functionality. See package definition
or `spack-build-out.txt` build log for details, e.g. tail -15 $(spack
location -i singularity)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependent_to.name: emacs
dependent_to.description: The Emacs programmable text editor.

dependent_to.name: libpostal
dependent_to.description:
A C library for parsing/normalizing street addresses around the world.
Powered by statistical NLP and open geo data.

dependent_to.name: gpi-space
dependent_to.description:
GPI-Space is a task-based workflow management system for parallel
applications. It allows the developers to build domain-specific
workflows using their own parallelization patterns, data management
policies and I/O routines, while relying on the runtime system for the
workflow management. The GPI-Space ecosystem "auto-manages" the
application with dynamic scheduling, built-in distributed memory
transfers and distributed tasks execution.

dependent_to.name: libxmu
dependent_to.description:
This library contains miscellaneous utilities and is not part of the
Xlib standard. It contains routines which only use public interfaces so
that it may be layered on top of any proprietary implementation of Xlib
or Xt.

dependent_to.name: libsndfile
dependent_to.description:
Libsndfile is a C library for reading and writing files containing
sampled sound (such as MS Windows WAV and the Apple/SGI AIFF format)
through one standard library interface. It is released in source code
format under the Gnu Lesser General Public License.

dependent_to.name: xplsprinters
dependent_to.description: List Xprint printers.

dependent_to.name: xclock
dependent_to.description:
xclock is the classic X Window System clock utility. It displays the
time in analog or digital form, continuously updated at a frequency
which may be specified by the user.

dependent_to.name: mkfontdir
dependent_to.description:
mkfontdir creates the fonts.dir files needed by the legacy X server core
font system. The current implementation is a simple wrapper script
around the mkfontscale program, which must be built and installed first.

dependent_to.name: conmon
dependent_to.description: An OCI container runtime monitor

dependent_to.name: libmetalink
dependent_to.description:
Libmetalink is a library to read Metalink XML download description
format. It supports both Metalink version 3 and Metalink version 4 (RFC
5854).

dependent_to.name: andi
dependent_to.description:
andi is used for for estimating the evolutionary distance between
closely related genomes.

dependent_to.name: gtksourceview
dependent_to.description:
GtkSourceView is a GNOME library that extends GtkTextView, the standard
GTK+ widget for multiline text editing. GtkSourceView adds support for
syntax highlighting, undo/redo, file loading and saving, search and
replace, a completion system, printing, displaying line numbers, and
other features typical of a source code editor.

dependent_to.name: libgit2
dependent_to.description:
libgit2 is a portable, pure C implementation of the Git core methods
provided as a re-entrant linkable library with a solid API, allowing you
to write native speed custom Git applications in any language which
supports C bindings.

dependent_to.name: libxscrnsaver
dependent_to.description: XScreenSaver - X11 Screen Saver extension client library

dependent_to.name: xbitmaps
dependent_to.description:
The xbitmaps package contains bitmap images used by multiple
applications built in Xorg.

dependent_to.name: libxdmcp
dependent_to.description: libXdmcp - X Display Manager Control Protocol library.

dependent_to.name: cube
dependent_to.description:
Cube the profile viewer for Score-P and Scalasca profiles. It displays a
multi-dimensional performance space consisting of the dimensions: -
performance metric - call path - system resource

dependent_to.name: chameleon
dependent_to.description: Dense Linear Algebra for Scalable Multi-core Architectures and GPGPUs

dependent_to.name: xkbutils
dependent_to.description:
xkbutils is a collection of small utilities utilizing the XKeyboard
(XKB) extension to the X11 protocol.

dependent_to.name: dbus-glib
dependent_to.description: dbus-glib package provides GLib interface for D-Bus API.

dependent_to.name: codes
dependent_to.description: CO-Design of multi-layer Exascale Storage (CODES) simulation framework

dependent_to.name: fluxbox
dependent_to.description:
Fluxbox is a windowmanager for X that was based on the Blackbox 0.61.1
code. It is very light on resources and easy to handle but yet full of
features to make an easy, and extremely fast, desktop experience.

dependent_to.name: flux-core
dependent_to.description: A next-generation resource manager (pre-alpha)

dependent_to.name: gccmakedep
dependent_to.description: X.org gccmakedep utilities.

dependent_to.name: dropwatch
dependent_to.description:
Dropwatch is a project I started in an effort to improve the ability for
developers and system administrator to diagnose problems in the Linux
Networking stack, specifically in our ability to diagnose where packets
are getting dropped.

dependent_to.name: scine-xtb
dependent_to.description: Wrapper around xtb to export it into the Scine tool chain.

dependent_to.name: perl-extutils-pkgconfig
dependent_to.description: simplistic interface to pkg-config

dependent_to.name: xvidtune
dependent_to.description:
xvidtune is a client interface to the X server video mode extension
(XFree86-VidModeExtension).

dependent_to.name: rdma-core
dependent_to.description: RDMA core userspace libraries and daemons

dependent_to.name: gnuplot
dependent_to.description:
Gnuplot is a portable command-line driven graphing utility for Linux,
OS/2, MS Windows, OSX, VMS, and many other platforms. The source code is
copyrighted but freely distributed (i.e., you don't have to pay for it).
It was originally created to allow scientists and students to visualize
mathematical functions and data interactively, but has grown to support
many non-interactive uses such as web scripting. It is also used as a
plotting engine by third-party applications like Octave. Gnuplot has
been supported and under active development since 1986

dependent_to.name: sosflow
dependent_to.description:
SOSflow provides a flexible, scalable, and programmable framework for
observation, introspection, feedback, and control of HPC applications.

dependent_to.name: qt-declarative
dependent_to.description: Qt Declarative (Quick 2).

dependent_to.name: xprehashprinterlist
dependent_to.description: Rehash list of Xprint printers.

dependent_to.description: A LibPressio plugin for Sperr

dependent_to.name: rendercheck
dependent_to.description:
rendercheck is a program to test a Render extension implementation
against separate calculations of expected output.

dependent_to.name: libnsl
dependent_to.description:
This library contains the public client interface for NIS(YP) and NIS+
in a IPv6 ready version.

dependent_to.name: libxxf86dga
dependent_to.description: libXxf86dga - Client library for the XFree86-DGA extension.

dependent_to.name: ophidia-primitives
dependent_to.description: Array-based primitives for the Ophidia framework

dependent_to.name: qt-quick3d
dependent_to.description: A new module and API for defining 3D content in Qt Quick.

dependent_to.name: xdriinfo
dependent_to.description: xdriinfo - query configuration information of X11 DRI drivers.

dependent_to.name: xorg-gtest
dependent_to.description:
Provides a Google Test environment for starting and stopping a X server
for testing purposes.

dependent_to.name: swig
dependent_to.description:
SWIG is an interface compiler that connects programs written in C and
C++ with scripting languages such as Perl, Python, Ruby, and Tcl. It
works by taking the declarations found in C/C++ header files and using
them to generate the wrapper code that scripting languages need to
access the underlying C/C++ code. In addition, SWIG provides a variety
of customization features that let you tailor the wrapping process to
suit your application.

dependent_to.name: py-fenics-dolfinx
dependent_to.description:
Python interface to the next generation FEniCS problem solving
environment

dependent_to.name: xorg-docs
dependent_to.description:
This package provides miscellaneous documentation for the X Window
System that doesn't better fit into other packages. The preferred
documentation format for these documents is DocBook XML.

dependent_to.name: gegl
dependent_to.description:
GEGL (Generic Graphics Library) is a data flow based image processing
framework, providing floating point processing and non-destructive image
processing capabilities to GNU Image Manipulation Program and other
projects (imgflo, GNOME Photos, iconographer, ...)

dependent_to.name: groff
dependent_to.description:
Groff (GNU troff) is a typesetting system that reads plain text mixed
with formatting commands and produces formatted output. Output may be
PostScript or PDF, html, or ASCII/UTF8 for display at the terminal.

dependent_to.name: libxslt
dependent_to.description:
Libxslt is the XSLT C library developed for the GNOME project. XSLT
itself is a an XML language to define transformation for XML. Libxslt is
based on libxml2 the XML C library developed for the GNOME project. It
also implements most of the EXSLT set of processor-portable extensions
functions and some of Saxon's evaluate and expressions extensions.

dependent_to.name: dbcsr
dependent_to.description: Distributed Block Compressed Sparse Row matrix library.

dependent_to.name: bear
dependent_to.description:
Bear is a tool that generates a compilation database for clang tooling
from non-cmake build systems.

dependent_to.name: printproto
dependent_to.description:
Xprint extension to the X11 protocol - a portable, network-transparent
printing system.

dependent_to.name: wxwidgets
dependent_to.description:
wxWidgets is a C++ library that lets developers create applications for
Windows, Mac OS X, Linux and other platforms with a single code base. It
has popular language bindings for Python, Perl, Ruby and many other
languages, and unlike other cross-platform toolkits, wxWidgets gives
applications a truly native look and feel because it uses the platform's
native API rather than emulating the GUI. It's also extensive, free,
open-source and mature.

dependent_to.name: mpich
dependent_to.description:
MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of the
Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependent_to.name: xinit
dependent_to.description:
The xinit program is used to start the X Window System server and a
first client program on systems that are not using a display manager
such as xdm.

dependent_to.name: gsoap
dependent_to.description:
The gSOAP toolkit is an extensive suite of portable C and C++ software
to develop XML Web services with powerful type-safe XML data bindings.

dependent_to.name: xman
dependent_to.description:
xman is a graphical manual page browser using the Athena Widgets (Xaw)
toolkit.

dependent_to.name: openslide
dependent_to.description: OpenSlide reads whole slide image files.

dependent_to.name: xdm
dependent_to.description: X Display Manager / XDMCP server.

dependent_to.description:
xfontsel application provides a simple way to display the X11 core
protocol fonts known to your X server, examine samples of each, and
retrieve the X Logical Font Description ("XLFD") full name for a font.

dependent_to.name: mgard
dependent_to.description:
MGARD error bounded lossy compressor forked from
https://github.com/CODARcode/MGARD with patches to support Spack

dependent_to.name: xsetmode
dependent_to.description: Set the mode for an X Input device.

dependent_to.name: smproxy
dependent_to.description:
smproxy allows X applications that do not support X11R6 session
management to participate in an X11R6 session.

dependent_to.name: parquet-cpp
dependent_to.description: C++ bindings for the Apache Parquet columnar data format.

dependent_to.name: makedepend

dependent_to.description: bitmap, bmtoa, atobm - X bitmap (XBM) editor and converter utilities.

dependent_to.name: gource
dependent_to.description: Software version control visualization.

dependent_to.name: lvm2
dependent_to.description:
LVM2 is the userspace toolset that provides logical volume management
facilities on linux. To use it you need 3 things: device-mapper in your
kernel, the userspace device-mapper support library (libdevmapper) and
the userspace LVM2 tools (dmsetup). These userspace components, and
associated header files, are provided by this package. See
http://sources.redhat.com/dm/ for additional information about the
device-mapper kernel and userspace components.

dependent_to.name: cdo
dependent_to.description:
CDO is a collection of command line Operators to manipulate and analyse
Climate and NWP model Data.

dependent_to.name: libxkbui
dependent_to.description: X.org libxkbui library.

dependent_to.name: qt-shadertools
dependent_to.description:
APIs and tools in this module provide the producer functionality for the
shader pipeline that allows Qt Quick to operate on Vulkan, Metal, and
Direct3D, in addition to OpenGL.

dependent_to.name: imagemagick
dependent_to.description:
ImageMagick is a software suite to create, edit, compose, or convert
bitmap images.

dependent_to.name: nfs-utils
dependent_to.description:
The NFS Utilities package contains the userspace server and client tools
necessary to use the kernel's NFS abilities. NFS is a protocol that
allows sharing file systems over the network.

dependent_to.name: apr-util
dependent_to.description: Apache Portable Runtime Utility

dependent_to.name: xbiff
dependent_to.description:
xbiff provides graphical notification of new e-mail. It only handles
mail stored in a filesystem accessible file, not via IMAP, POP or other
remote access protocols.

dependent_to.name: libcroco
dependent_to.description: Libcroco is a standalone css2 parsing and manipulation library.

dependent_to.name: amdsmi
dependent_to.description:
The AMD System Management Interface Library, or AMD SMI library, is a C
library for Linux that provides a user space interface for applications
to monitor and control AMD device.

dependent_to.name: json-glib
dependent_to.description:
JSON-GLib is a library for reading and parsing JSON using GLib and
GObject data types and API.

dependent_to.name: gdk-pixbuf
dependent_to.description:
The Gdk Pixbuf is a toolkit for image loading and pixel buffer
manipulation. It is used by GTK+ 2 and GTK+ 3 to load and manipulate
images. In the past it was distributed as part of GTK+ 2 but it was
split off into a separate package in preparation for the change to GTK+
3.

dependent_to.name: bubblewrap
dependent_to.description: Unprivileged sandboxing tool

dependent_to.name: knem
dependent_to.description:
KNEM is a Linux kernel module enabling high-performance intra-node MPI
communication for large messages.

dependent_to.name: protobuf-c
dependent_to.description: Protocol Buffers implementation in C

dependent_to.name: phist
dependent_to.description:
The Pipelined, Hybrid-parallel Iterative Solver Toolkit provides
implementations of and interfaces to block iterative solvers for sparse
linear and eigenvalue problems. In contrast to other libraries we
support multiple backends (e.g. Trilinos, PETSc and our own optimized
kernels), and interfaces in multiple languages such as C, C++, Fortran
2003 and Python. PHIST has a clear focus on portability and hardware
performance: in particular support row-major storage of block vectors
and using GPUs (via the ghost library or Trilinos/Tpetra).

dependent_to.name: xfwp
dependent_to.description: xfwp proxies X11 protocol connections, such as through a firewall.

dependent_to.name: xtrans
dependent_to.description:
xtrans is a library of code that is shared among various X packages to
handle network protocol transport in a modular fashion, allowing a
single place to add new transport types. It is used by the X server,
libX11, libICE, the X font server, and related components.

dependent_to.name: bigreqsproto
dependent_to.description:
Big Requests Extension. This extension defines a protocol to enable the
use of requests that exceed 262140 bytes in length.

dependent_to.name: axel
dependent_to.description: Axel is a light command line download accelerator for Linux and Unix

dependent_to.name: libnetfilter-conntrack
dependent_to.description:
libnetfilter_conntrack is a userspace library providing a programming
interface (API) to the in-kernel connection tracking state table.

dependent_to.name: zziplib
dependent_to.description:
The zziplib provides read access to zipped files in a zip-archive, using
compression based solely on free algorithms provided by zlib. It also
provides a functionality to overlay the archive filesystem with the
filesystem of the operating system environment.

dependent_to.name: rstart
dependent_to.description:
This package includes both the client and server sides implementing the
protocol described in the "A Flexible Remote Execution Protocol Based on
rsh" paper found in the specs/ subdirectory. This software has been
deprecated in favor of the X11 forwarding provided in common ssh
implementations.

dependent_to.name: xwd
dependent_to.description: xwd - dump an image of an X window.

dependent_to.name: rpm
dependent_to.description:
The RPM package manager https://github.com/rpm-software-
management/rpm/blob/master/INSTALL Note that debugedit is an additional
tool that *should* compile with adding libdw and elfutils, but the
library (as of 4.16.1.2) is being removed from rpm and will be put
somewhere else.

dependent_to.name: xlsatoms
dependent_to.description: xlsatoms lists the interned atoms defined on an X11 server.

dependent_to.name: libcanberra
dependent_to.description:
libcanberra is an implementation of the XDG Sound Theme and Name
Specifications, for generating event sounds on free desktops, such as
GNOME.

dependent_to.name: mc
dependent_to.description: The GNU Midnight Commander is a visual file manager.

dependent_to.name: xbacklight
dependent_to.description:
Xbacklight is used to adjust the backlight brightness where supported.
It uses the RandR extension to find all outputs on the X server
supporting backlight brightness control and changes them all in the same
way.

dependent_to.name: util-linux
dependent_to.description: Util-linux is a suite of essential utilities for any Linux system.

dependent_to.name: xcalc
dependent_to.description:
xcalc is a scientific calculator X11 client that can emulate a TI-30 or
an HP-10C.

dependent_to.name: ncdu
dependent_to.description:
Ncdu is a disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface. It is designed
to find space hogs on a remote server where you don't have an entire
gaphical setup available, but it is a useful tool even on regular
desktop systems. Ncdu aims to be fast, simple and easy to use, and
should be able to run in any minimal POSIX-like environment with ncurses
installed.

dependent_to.name: neko
dependent_to.description:
Neko: A modern, portable, and scalable framework for high-fidelity
computational fluid dynamics

dependent_to.name: mdsplus
dependent_to.description:
A set of software tools for data acquisition and storage and a
methodology for management of complex scientific data.

dependent_to.name: libxt
dependent_to.description: libXt - X Toolkit Intrinsics library.

dependent_to.name: xf86dga
dependent_to.description: dga is a simple test client for the XFree86-DGA extension.

dependent_to.name: xconsole
dependent_to.description:
xconsole displays in a X11 window the messages which are usually sent to
/dev/console.

dependent_to.name: xfd
dependent_to.description:
xfd - display all the characters in a font using either the X11 core
protocol or libXft2.

dependent_to.name: grads
dependent_to.description:
The Grid Analysis and Display System (GrADS) is an interactive desktop
tool that is used for easy access, manipulation, and visualization of
earth science data. GrADS has two data models for handling gridded and
station data. GrADS supports many data file formats, including binary
(stream or sequential), GRIB (version 1 and 2), NetCDF, HDF (version 4
and 5), and BUFR (for station data).

dependent_to.name: libxcb
dependent_to.description:
The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib
featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the
protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.

dependent_to.name: xev
dependent_to.description:
xev creates a window and then asks the X server to send it X11 events
whenever anything happens to the window (such as it being moved,
resized, typed in, clicked in, etc.). You can also attach it to an
existing window. It is useful for seeing what causes events to occur and
to display the information that they contain; it is essentially a
debugging and development tool, and should not be needed in normal
usage.

dependent_to.name: xkbprint
dependent_to.description:
xkbprint generates a printable or encapsulated PostScript description of
an XKB keyboard description.

dependent_to.name: libxi
dependent_to.description: libXi - library for the X Input Extension.

dependent_to.name: glusterfs
dependent_to.description:
Gluster is a software defined distributed storage that can scale to
several petabytes. It provides interfaces for object, block and file
storage.

dependent_to.name: xcmiscproto
dependent_to.description:
XC-MISC Extension. This extension defines a protocol that provides Xlib
two ways to query the server for available resource IDs.

dependent_to.name: qgis
dependent_to.description:
QGIS is a free and open-source cross-platform desktop geographic
information system application that supports viewing, editing, and
analysis of geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: xmh
dependent_to.description:
The xmh program provides a graphical user interface to the MH Message
Handling System. To actually do things with your mail, it makes calls to
the MH package.

dependent_to.name: bind9
dependent_to.description: BIND 9 has evolved to be a very flexible, full-featured DNS system.

dependent_to.name: mosh
dependent_to.description:
Remote terminal application that allows roaming, supports intermittent
connectivity, and provides intelligent local echo and line editing of
user keystrokes. Mosh is a replacement for SSH. It's more robust and
responsive, especially over Wi-Fi, cellular, and long-distance links.

dependent_to.name: tesseract
dependent_to.description: Tesseract Open Source OCR Engine.

dependent_to.name: libxxf86vm
dependent_to.description: libXxf86vm - Extension library for the XFree86-VidMode X extension.

dependent_to.name: libxp
dependent_to.description: libXp - X Print Client Library.

dependent_to.name: py-tokenizers
dependent_to.description: Fast and Customizable Tokenizers.

dependent_to.name: julea
dependent_to.description:
JULEA is a flexible storage framework that allows offering arbitrary I/O
interfaces to applications. To be able to rapidly prototype new
approaches, it offers object, key-value and database backends. Support
for popular storage technologies such as POSIX, LevelDB and MongoDB is
already included.

dependent_to.name: ipopt
dependent_to.description:
Ipopt (Interior Point OPTimizer, pronounced eye-pea-Opt) is a software
package for large-scale nonlinear optimization.

dependent_to.name: rust
dependent_to.description: The Rust programming language toolchain.

dependent_to.name: xkbcomp
dependent_to.description:
The X Keyboard (XKB) Extension essentially replaces the core protocol
definition of a keyboard. The extension makes it possible to specify
clearly and explicitly most aspects of keyboard behaviour on a per-key
basis, and to track more closely the logical and physical state of a
keyboard. It also includes a number of keyboard controls designed to
make keyboards more accessible to people with physical impairments.

dependent_to.name: xpr
dependent_to.description:
xpr takes as input a window dump file produced by xwd and formats it for
output on various types of printers.

dependent_to.name: palace
dependent_to.description: 3D finite element solver for computational electromagnetics

dependent_to.name: xf86vidmodeproto
dependent_to.description:
XFree86 Video Mode Extension. This extension defines a protocol for
dynamically configuring modelines and gamma.

dependent_to.name: listres
dependent_to.description:
The listres program generates a list of X resources for a widget in an X
client written using a toolkit based on libXt.

dependent_to.name: gitconddb
dependent_to.description:
Conditions Database library using a Git repository as the storage
backend

dependent_to.name: xsm
dependent_to.description: X Session Manager.

dependent_to.name: swipl
dependent_to.description:
SWI-Prolog is a versatile implementation of the Prolog language.
Although SWI-Prolog gained its popularity primarily in education, its
development is mostly driven by the needs for application development.
This is facilitated by a rich interface to other IT components by
supporting many document types and (network) protocols as well as a
comprehensive low-level interface to C that is the basis for high-level
interfaces to C++, Java (bundled), C#, Python, etc (externally
available). Data type extensions such as dicts and strings as well as
full support for Unicode and unbounded integers simplify smooth exchange
of data with other components.

dependent_to.name: py-pkgconfig
dependent_to.description: Interface Python with pkg-config.

dependent_to.name: q-e-sirius
dependent_to.description: SIRIUS enabled fork of QuantumESPRESSO.

dependent_to.name: libtermkey
dependent_to.description: Easy keyboard entry processing for terminal programs

dependent_to.name: dftd4
dependent_to.description:
Generally Applicable Atomic-Charge Dependent London Dispersion
Correction

dependent_to.name: poke
dependent_to.description: "The extensible editor for structured binary data

dependent_to.name: r-libpressio
dependent_to.description: R package for libpressio

dependent_to.name: qoz
dependent_to.description:
Quality optimized version of SZ3 is the next generation of the SZ
compressor framework

dependent_to.name: xcursor-themes
dependent_to.description:
This is a default set of cursor themes for use with libXcursor,
originally created for the XFree86 Project, and now shipped as part of
the X.Org software distribution.

dependent_to.description: XSCOPE -- a program to monitor X11/Client conversations.

dependent_to.name: libxpm
dependent_to.description: libXpm - X Pixmap (XPM) image file format library.

dependent_to.name: libdmx

libdmx - X Window System DMX (Distributed Multihead X) extension
library.

dependent_to.name: wt
dependent_to.description:
Wt, C++ Web Toolkit. Wt is a C++ library for developing web
applications.

dependent_to.name: xauth
dependent_to.description:
The xauth program is used to edit and display the authorization
information used in connecting to the X server.

dependent_to.name: fixesproto
dependent_to.description:
X Fixes Extension. The extension makes changes to many areas of the
protocol to resolve issues raised by application interaction with core
protocol mechanisms that cannot be adequately worked around on the
client side of the wire.

dependent_to.name: xphelloworld
dependent_to.description: Xprint sample applications.

dependent_to.name: rtags
dependent_to.description: RTags is a client/server application that indexes C/C++ code

dependent_to.name: debugedit
dependent_to.description:
Debugedit is a set of libraries and programs for creating and editing
debuginfo. It allows you to get build-ids and rewrite DWARF source
paths. Debugedit was originally part of the rpm project, and now exists
as its own separate project and is maintained by RedHat.

dependent_to.name: osi
dependent_to.description:
Osi (Open Solver Interface) provides an abstract base class to a generic
linear programming (LP) solver, along with derived classes for specific
solvers. Many applications may be able to use the Osi to insulate
themselves from a specific LP solver. That is, programs written to the
OSI standard may be linked to any solver with an OSI interface and
should produce correct results. The OSI has been significantly extended
compared to its first incarnation. Currently, the OSI supports linear
programming solvers and has rudimentary support for integer programming.

dependent_to.name: xrefresh
dependent_to.description: xrefresh - refresh all or part of an X screen.

dependent_to.name: bdftopcf
dependent_to.description:
bdftopcf is a font compiler for the X server and font server. Fonts in
Portable Compiled Format can be read by any architecture, although the
file is structured to allow one particular architecture to read them
directly without reformatting. This allows fast reading on the
appropriate machine, but the files are still portable (but read more
slowly) on other machines.

dependent_to.name: pmdk
dependent_to.description:
The Persistent Memory Development Kit (PMDK), formerly known as NVML, is
a library for using memory-mapped persistence, optimized specifically
for persistent memory

dependent_to.name: libxft
dependent_to.description:
X FreeType library. Xft version 2.1 was the first stand alone release of
Xft, a library that connects X applications with the FreeType font
rasterization library. Xft uses fontconfig to locate fonts so it has no
configuration files.

dependent_to.name: xmodmap
dependent_to.description:
The xmodmap program is used to edit and display the keyboard modifier
map and keymap table that are used by client applications to convert
event keycodes into keysyms. It is usually run from the user's session
startup script to configure the keyboard according to personal tastes.

dependent_to.name: libxkbfile
dependent_to.description: XKB file handling routines.

dependent_to.name: hsakmt-roct
dependent_to.description:
This is a thunk python recipe to build and install Thunk Interface.
Thunk Interface is a user-mode API interfaces used to interact with the
ROCk driver.

dependent_to.name: watch
dependent_to.description: Executes a program periodically, showing output fullscreen.

dependent_to.name: ophidia-analytics-framework
dependent_to.description: Core modules and operators of the Ophidia framework

dependent_to.name: xorg-cf-files
dependent_to.description:
The xorg-cf-files package contains the data files for the imake utility,
defining the known settings for a wide variety of platforms (many of
which have not been verified or tested in over a decade), and for many
of the libraries formerly delivered in the X.Org monolithic releases.

dependent_to.name: xcb-util-keysyms
dependent_to.description:
The XCB util modules provides a number of libraries which sit on top of
libxcb, the core X protocol library, and some of the extension
libraries. These experimental libraries provide convenience functions
and interfaces which make the raw X protocol more usable. Some of the
libraries also provide client-side code which is not strictly part of
the X protocol but which have traditionally been provided by Xlib.

dependent_to.name: unifyfs
dependent_to.description:
User level file system that enables applications to use node-local
storage as burst buffers for shared files. Supports scalable and
efficient aggregation of I/O bandwidth from burst buffers while having
the same life cycle as a batch-submitted job. UnifyFS is designed to
support common I/O workloads, including checkpoint/restart. While
primarily designed for N-N write/read, UnifyFS compliments its
functionality with the support for N-1 write/read.

dependent_to.name: fuse-overlayfs
dependent_to.description: An implementation of overlay+shiftfs in FUSE for rootless containers.

dependent_to.name: wayland-protocols
dependent_to.description:
wayland-protocols contains Wayland protocols that add functionality not
available in the Wayland core protocol. Such protocols either add
completely new functionality, or extend the functionality of some other
protocol either in Wayland core, or some other protocol i n wayland-
protocols.

dependent_to.name: speexdsp
dependent_to.description: SpeexDSP is a patent-free, Open Source/Free Software DSP library.

dependent_to.name: hdf5
dependent_to.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependent_to.name: libxinerama
dependent_to.description: libXinerama - API for Xinerama extension to X11 Protocol.

dependent_to.name: xineramaproto
dependent_to.description:
X Xinerama Extension. This is an X extension that allows multiple
physical screens controlled by a single X server to appear as a single
screen.

dependent_to.name: nghttp2
dependent_to.description:
nghttp2 is an implementation of HTTP/2 and its header compression
algorithm HPACK in C.

dependent_to.name: libxshmfence
dependent_to.description:
libxshmfence - Shared memory 'SyncFence' synchronization primitive. This
library offers a CPU-based synchronization primitive compatible with the
X SyncFence objects that can be shared between processes using file
descriptor passing.

dependent_to.name: xload
dependent_to.description:
xload displays a periodically updating histogram of the system load
average.

dependent_to.name: lndir
dependent_to.description:
lndir - create a shadow directory of symbolic links to another directory
tree.

dependent_to.name: thrift
dependent_to.description:
Software framework for scalable cross-language services development.
Thrift combines a software stack with a code generation engine to build
services that work efficiently and seamlessly between C++, Java, Python,
PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js,
Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and other languages.

dependent_to.name: exonerate
dependent_to.description: Pairwise sequence alignment of DNA and proteins

dependent_to.name: sz-cpp
dependent_to.description: Refactorization of SZ in cpp

dependent_to.name: ucx
dependent_to.description:
a communication library implementing high-performance messaging for
MPI/PGAS frameworks

dependent_to.name: krb5
dependent_to.description: Network authentication protocol

dependent_to.name: libpressio
dependent_to.description: A generic abstraction for the compression of dense tensors

dependent_to.name: libpulsar
dependent_to.description:
libpulsar is a C/C++ client library implementation of the Apache Pulsar
protocol.

dependent_to.name: pocl
dependent_to.description:
Portable Computing Language (pocl) is an open source implementation of
the OpenCL standard which can be easily adapted for new targets and
devices, both for homogeneous CPU and heterogeneous GPUs/accelerators.

dependent_to.name: fstobdf
dependent_to.description:
The fstobdf program reads a font from a font server and prints a BDF
file on the standard output that may be used to recreate the font. This
is useful in testing servers, debugging font metrics, and reproducing
lost BDF files.

dependent_to.name: miopen-opencl
dependent_to.description: AMD's library for high performance machine learning primitives.

dependent_to.name: binutils
dependent_to.description: GNU binutils, which contain the linker, assembler, objdump and others

dependent_to.name: libslirp
dependent_to.description: General purpose TCP-IP emulator

dependent_to.name: kbproto
dependent_to.description:
X Keyboard Extension. This extension defines a protcol to provide a
number of new capabilities and controls for text keyboards.

dependent_to.name: xlogo
dependent_to.description: The xlogo program simply displays the X Window System logo.

dependent_to.name: squashfuse
dependent_to.description: squashfuse - Mount SquashFS archives using FUSE

dependent_to.name: libpipeline
dependent_to.description:
libpipeline is a C library for manipulating pipelines of subprocesses in
a flexible and convenient way.

dependent_to.name: nauty
dependent_to.description:
nauty and Traces are programs for computing automorphism groups of
graphsq and digraphs

dependent_to.name: icedtea
dependent_to.description:
The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from
https://openjdk.java.net/ using Free Software build tools and adds a
number of key features to the upstream OpenJDK codebase. IcedTea
requires an existing IcedTea or OpenJDK install to build.

dependent_to.name: libxtrap
dependent_to.description:
libXTrap is the Xlib-based client API for the DEC-XTRAP extension. XTrap
was a proposed standard extension for X11R5 which facilitated the
capturing of server protocol and synthesizing core input events. Digital
participated in the X Consortium's xtest working group which chose to
evolve XTrap functionality into the XTEST & RECORD extensions for X11R6.
As X11R6 was released in 1994, XTrap has now been deprecated for over 15
years, and uses of it should be quite rare.

dependent_to.name: sessreg
dependent_to.description:
Sessreg is a simple program for managing utmp/wtmp entries for X
sessions. It was originally written for use with xdm, but may also be
used with other display managers such as gdm or kdm.

dependent_to.name: font-util
dependent_to.description: X.Org font package creation/installation utilities and fonts.

dependent_to.name: libxml2
dependent_to.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.

dependent_to.name: shared-mime-info
dependent_to.description: Database of common MIME types.

dependent_to.name: pcsclite
dependent_to.description:
PCSC lite project Middleware to access a smart card using SCard API
(PC/SC).

dependent_to.name: salmon
dependent_to.description:
Salmon is a tool for quantifying the expression of transcripts using
RNA-seq data.

dependent_to.name: libxxf86misc
dependent_to.description: libXxf86misc - Extension library for the XFree86-Misc X extension.

dependent_to.name: libqrencode
dependent_to.description: libqrencode - a fast and compact QR Code encoding library.

dependent_to.name: netdata
dependent_to.description: Real-time performance monitoring, done right!

dependent_to.name: xwininfo
dependent_to.description:
xwininfo prints information about windows on an X server. Various
information is displayed depending on which options are selected.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: fontsproto
dependent_to.description: X Fonts Extension.

dependent_to.name: proxymngr
dependent_to.description:
The proxy manager (proxymngr) is responsible for resolving requests from
xfindproxy (and other similar clients), starting new proxies when
appropriate, and keeping track of all of the available proxy services.
The proxy manager strives to reuse existing proxies whenever possible.

dependent_to.name: libdc1394
dependent_to.description: Library providing an API for IEEE 1394 cameras.

dependent_to.name: pixman
dependent_to.description:
The Pixman package contains a library that provides low-level pixel
manipulation features such as image compositing and trapezoid
rasterization.

dependent_to.name: gtk-doc
dependent_to.description:
GtkDoc is a tool used to extract API documentation from C-code like
Doxygen, but handles documentation of GObject (including signals and
properties) that makes it very suitable for GTK+ apps and libraries. It
uses docbook for intermediate files and can produce html by default and
pdf/man-pages with some extra work.

dependent_to.name: libxtst
dependent_to.description:
libXtst provides the Xlib-based client API for the XTEST & RECORD
extensions. The XTEST extension is a minimal set of client and server
extensions required to completely test the X11 server with no user
intervention. This extension is not intended to support general
journaling and playback of user actions. The RECORD extension supports
the recording and reporting of all core X protocol and arbitrary X
extension protocol.

dependent_to.name: mkfontscale
dependent_to.description:
mkfontscale creates the fonts.scale and fonts.dir index files used by
the legacy X11 font system.

dependent_to.name: iceauth
dependent_to.description:
The iceauth program is used to edit and display the authorization
information used in connecting with ICE. It operates very much like the
xauth program for X11 connection authentication records.

dependent_to.name: folly
dependent_to.description:
Folly (acronymed loosely after Facebook Open Source Library) is a
library of C++11 components designed with practicality and efficiency in
mind. Folly contains a variety of core library components used
extensively at Facebook. In particular, it's often a dependency of
Facebook's other open source C++ efforts and place where those projects
can share code.

dependent_to.name: libfive
dependent_to.description: libfive is a software library and set of tools for solid modeling.

dependent_to.name: xsetroot
dependent_to.description: xsetroot - root window parameter setting utility for X.

dependent_to.name: scripts
dependent_to.description: Various X related scripts.

dependent_to.name: xcb-demo
dependent_to.description: xcb-demo: A collection of demo programs that use the XCB library.

dependent_to.name: llvm-doe
dependent_to.description:
This package provides a collection of the experimental LLVM projects
done by the US DOE research and development teams.

dependent_to.name: magics
dependent_to.description:
Magics is the latest generation of the ECMWF's Meteorological plotting
software MAGICS. Although completely redesigned in C++, it is intended
to be as backwards-compatible as possible with the Fortran interface.

dependent_to.name: qt-svg
dependent_to.description:
Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) is an XML-based language for describing
two-dimensional vector graphics. Qt provides classes for rendering and
displaying SVG drawings in widgets and on other paint devices.

dependent_to.name: glproto
dependent_to.description:
OpenGL Extension to the X Window System. This extension defines a
protocol for the client to send 3D rendering commands to the X server.

dependent_to.name: libusbmuxd
dependent_to.description: A client library to multiplex connections from and to iOS devices.

dependent_to.name: freebayes
dependent_to.description: Bayesian haplotype-based genetic polymorphism discovery and genotyping.

dependent_to.name: showfont
dependent_to.description:
showfont displays data about a font from an X font server. The
information shown includes font information, font properties, character
metrics, and character bitmaps.

dependent_to.name: xproto
dependent_to.description:
X Window System Core Protocol. This package provides the headers and
specification documents defining the X Window System Core Protocol,
Version 11. It also includes a number of headers that aren't purely
protocol related, but are depended upon by many other X Window System
packages to provide common definitions and porting layer.

dependent_to.name: xkbevd
dependent_to.description: XKB event daemon demo.

dependent_to.name: man-db
dependent_to.description:
man-db is an implementation of the standard Unix documentation system
accessed using the man command. It uses a Berkeley DB database in place
of the traditional flat-text whatis databases.

dependent_to.name: mongo-c-driver
dependent_to.description: libmongoc is a client library written in C for MongoDB.

dependent_to.name: scitokens-cpp
dependent_to.description:
A C++ implementation of the SciTokens library with a C library
interface. SciTokens provide a token format for distributed
authorization.

dependent_to.name: libemos
dependent_to.description:
The Interpolation library (EMOSLIB) includes Interpolation software and
BUFR & CREX encoding/decoding routines.

dependent_to.name: mxnet
dependent_to.description:
MXNet is a deep learning framework designed for both efficiency and
flexibility.

dependent_to.name: libcircle
dependent_to.description:
libcircle provides an efficient distributed queue on a cluster, using
self-stabilizing work stealing.

dependent_to.name: py-xtb
dependent_to.description: Python API for the extended tight binding program package

dependent_to.name: ophidia-server
dependent_to.description: Front-end server of the Ophidia framework

dependent_to.name: libxfont2
dependent_to.description:
libXfont provides the core of the legacy X11 font system, handling the
index files (fonts.dir, fonts.alias, fonts.scale), the various font file
formats, and rasterizing them. It is used by the X servers, the X Font
Server (xfs), and some font utilities (bdftopcf for instance), but
should not be used by normal X11 clients. X11 clients access fonts via
either the new API's in libXft, or the legacy API's in libX11.

dependent_to.name: libspatialite
dependent_to.description:
SpatiaLite is an open source library intended to extend the SQLite core
to support fully fledged Spatial SQL capabilities.

dependent_to.name: czmq
dependent_to.description: A C interface to the ZMQ library

dependent_to.name: xedit
dependent_to.description: Xedit is a simple text editor for X.

dependent_to.name: recordproto
dependent_to.description:
X Record Extension. This extension defines a protocol for the recording
and playback of user actions in the X Window System.

dependent_to.name: llvm-amdgpu
dependent_to.description:
Toolkit for the construction of highly optimized compilers, optimizers,
and run-time environments.

dependent_to.name: qt-base
dependent_to.description: Qt Base (Core, Gui, Widgets, Network, ...)

dependent_to.name: xstdcmap
dependent_to.description:
The xstdcmap utility can be used to selectively define standard colormap
properties. It is intended to be run from a user's X startup script to
create standard colormap definitions in order to facilitate sharing of
scarce colormap resources among clients using PseudoColor visuals.

dependent_to.name: at-spi2-atk
dependent_to.description:
The At-Spi2 Atk package contains a library that bridges ATK to At-Spi2
D-Bus service.

dependent_to.name: libidl
dependent_to.description: libraries for Interface Definition Language files

dependent_to.name: ruby
dependent_to.description:
A dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity
and productivity.

dependent_to.name: ns-3-dev
dependent_to.description:
ns-3 is a discrete-event network simulator, targeted primarily for
research and educational use

dependent_to.name: xprop
dependent_to.description:
xprop is a command line tool to display and/or set window and font
properties of an X server.

dependent_to.name: openldap
dependent_to.description:
OpenLDAP Software is an open source implementation of the Lightweight
Directory Access Protocol. The suite includes: slapd - stand-alone LDAP
daemon (server) libraries implementing the LDAP protocol, and utilities,
tools, and sample clients.

dependent_to.name: fipscheck
dependent_to.description:
The integrity check is only one of many requirements needed for
validation of a software cryptographic module.

dependent_to.name: slurm
dependent_to.description:
Slurm is an open source, fault-tolerant, and highly scalable cluster
management and job scheduling system for large and small Linux clusters.
Slurm requires no kernel modifications for its operation and is
relatively self-contained. As a cluster workload manager, Slurm has
three key functions. First, it allocates exclusive and/or non-exclusive
access to resources (compute nodes) to users for some duration of time
so they can perform work. Second, it provides a framework for starting,
executing, and monitoring work (normally a parallel job) on the set of
allocated nodes. Finally, it arbitrates contention for resources by
managing a queue of pending work.

dependent_to.name: xfs
dependent_to.description: X Font Server.

dependent_to.name: mpibind
dependent_to.description:
A memory-driven algorithm to map parallel codes to heterogeneous
architectures

dependent_to.name: libnftnl
dependent_to.description:
A library for low-level interaction with nftables Netlink's API over
libmnl.

dependent_to.name: setxkbmap
dependent_to.description:
setxkbmap is an X11 client to change the keymaps in the X server for a
specified keyboard to use the layout determined by the options listed on
the command line.

dependent_to.name: asio
dependent_to.description: C++ library for network and low-level I/O programming.

dependent_to.name: libwindowswm

WindowsWM - Cygwin/X rootless window management extension. WindowsWM is

This extension allows X window managers to better interact with the
Cygwin XWin server when running X11 in a rootless mode.

dependent_to.name: mctc-lib

dependent_to.name: root
dependent_to.description: ROOT is a data analysis framework.

dependent_to.name: libxvmc
dependent_to.description: X.org libXvMC library.

xcmsdb is used to load, query, or remove Device Color Characterization
data stored in properties on the root window of the screen as specified
in section 7, Device Color Characterization, of the X11 Inter-Client
Communication Conventions Manual (ICCCM).

dependent_to.name: xf86driproto
dependent_to.description:
XFree86 Direct Rendering Infrastructure Extension. This extension
defines a protocol to allow user applications to access the video
hardware without requiring data to be passed through the X server.

dependent_to.name: launchmon
dependent_to.description:
Software infrastructure that enables HPC run-time tools to co-locate
tool daemons with a parallel job.

dependent_to.name: diffmark
dependent_to.description: Diffmark is a DSL for transforming one string to another.

dependent_to.name: universal-ctags
dependent_to.description:
Universal Ctags generates an index (or tag) file of language objects
found in source files for many popular programming languages. This index
makes it easy for text editors and other tools to locate the indexed
items.

dependent_to.name: dri3proto
dependent_to.description:
Direct Rendering Infrastructure 3 Extension. This extension defines a
protocol to securely allow user applications to access the video
hardware without requiring data to be passed through the X server.

dependent_to.name: precice
dependent_to.description:
preCICE (Precise Code Interaction Coupling Environment) is a coupling
library for partitioned multi-physics simulations. Partitioned means
that preCICE couples existing programs (solvers) capable of simulating a
subpart of the complete physics involved in a simulation.

dependent_to.name: szauto
dependent_to.description:
SZauto: SZ C++ Version that Supports Second-Order Prediction and
Parameter Optimization

dependent_to.name: wget
dependent_to.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.

dependent_to.name: xfindproxy
dependent_to.description:
xfindproxy is used to locate available X11 proxy services. It utilizes
the Proxy Management Protocol to communicate with a proxy manager. The
proxy manager keeps track of all available proxy services, starts new
proxies when necessary, and makes sure that proxies are shared whenever
possible.

dependent_to.name: xkill
dependent_to.description:
xkill is a utility for forcing the X server to close connections to
clients. This program is very dangerous, but is useful for aborting
programs that have displayed undesired windows on a user's screen.

dependent_to.name: exago
dependent_to.description:
ExaGO is a package for solving large-scale power grid optimization
problems on parallel and distributed architectures, particularly
targeted for exascale machines.

dependent_to.name: mlirmiopen
dependent_to.description: Multi-Level Intermediate Representation for rocm miopen project.

dependent_to.name: mvapich2
dependent_to.description:
Mvapich2 is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)

dependent_to.name: singularityce
dependent_to.description:
Singularity is a container technology focused on building portable
encapsulated environments to support "Mobility of Compute" For older
versions of Singularity (pre 3.0) you should use singularity-legacy,
which has a different install base (Autotools). Needs post-install
chmod/chown steps to enable full functionality. See package definition
or `spack-build-out.txt` build log for details, e.g. tail -15 $(spack
location -i singularityce)/.spack/spack-build-out.txt

dependent_to.name: libxaw3d
dependent_to.description:
Xaw3d is the X 3D Athena Widget Set. Xaw3d is a widget set based on the
X Toolkit Intrinsics (Xt) Library.

dependent_to.name: pdf2svg
dependent_to.description: A simple PDF to SVG converter using the Poppler and Cairo libraries.

dependent_to.description: liblbxutil - Low Bandwith X extension (LBX) utility routines.
